publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3583 Mr Gil Paterson: White Ribbon Campaign to End Violence Against Women-That the Parliament supports the White Ribbon Campaign, which leads up to the UN International Day Against Women on 25 November 2002; recognises the white ribbon as the international symbol for a world where women and girls can live free from the fear of violence; supports the work of the UK White Ribbon Campaign, co-ordinated by WOMANKIND Worldwide, to raise funds and awareness to end violence against women; notes with alarm the prevalence and gravity of violence against women, with one in four women in the UK experiencing domestic violence at some point in their lives, and one in 20 women suffering rape, and at least one in every three women around the world being beaten, coerced into sex, or abused in some other way, and urges MSPs and others to support this campaign by wearing a white ribbon to show their support for ending violence against women.

S1M-3583 Mr Gil Paterson: White Ribbon Campaign to End Violence Against Women-That the Parliament supports the White Ribbon Campaign, which leads up to the UN International Day for the Elimination of Violence Against Women on 25 November 2002; recognises the white ribbon as the international symbol for a world where women and girls can live free from the fear of violence; supports the work of the UK White Ribbon Campaign, co-ordinated by WOMANKIND Worldwide, to raise funds and awareness to end violence against women; notes with alarm the prevalence and gravity of violence against women, with one in four women in the UK experiencing domestic violence at some point in their lives, and one in 20 women suffering rape, and at least one in every three women around the world being beaten, coerced into sex, or abused in some other way, and urges MSPs and others to support this campaign by wearing a white ribbon to show their support for ending violence against women. Supported by: Ms Sandra White*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Andrew Wilson*, Michael Matheson*

S1M-3583 White Ribbon Campaign to End Violence Against Women (lodged on 14 November 2002) Jackie Baillie*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Robin Harper*, Fiona Hyslop*, Margaret Jamieson*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr John McAllion*
S1M-3583 White Ribbon Campaign to End Violence Against Women (lodged on 14 November 2002) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Irene McGugan*, Bill Butler*, Alex Neil*
S1M-3583 White Ribbon Campaign to End Violence Against Women (lodged on 14 November 2002) Scott Barrie*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Tommy Sheridan*, Trish Godman*, Karen Whitefield*
S1M-3583 White Ribbon Campaign to End Violence Against Women (lodged on 14 November 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*, Shona Robison*
S1M-3583 White Ribbon Campaign to End Violence Against Women (lodged on 14 November 2002) Johann Lamont*
S1M-3583 White Ribbon Campaign to End Violence Against Women (lodged on 14 November 2002) Susan Deacon*
